QuestData.Title: Shield, Meet Spell
QuestData.Description: There you have it, one arcane nullifier! Using their weapon and magical signatures to cloak the spell, it should tear apart the shield as good as any spellbreaker would.$b$bGo teach that amateur spellslinger what it means to wage war against the sin'dorei!
QuestData.AreaDescription: Use the Arcane Nullifier to defeat Arcshaper Thorendis.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Arcane Nullifier to defeat Arcshaper Thorendis.
QuestData.CompletionText: The nullifier should do most of the work for you. Just watch out for his offensive magic!
QuestData.RewardText: Good. With him out of the way we will be able to establish a stronger foothold once the main force arrives.
